critical.name: Critical
critical.description: Critical range increased one step. E.g. 20 → 19–20. Applies multiple times.

deadlier.name: Deadlier
deadlier.description: Damage dice increase one step. E.g. 1d6 → 1d8. Applies multiple times.

faster.name: Faster
faster.description: [+] to initiative. Duel: free attack before initiative.

finisher.name: Finisher
finisher.description: On crit: target tests charisma vs 10 + hero's level or is knocked out of the fight.

geneslicer.name: Gene-Slicer
geneslicer.description: Deals an extra 1d6 ka damage if ha is the target's highest defence.

glimmering.name: Glimmering
glimmering.description: Has a glowing aura, as bright as a candle. May be changed to another sensory effect.

hardhitting.name: Hard-hitting
hardhitting.description: Critical multiplier increased one step. E.g. x2 → x3. Applies multiple times.

likemagic.name: Like Magic
likemagic.description: Item is ‘magical’ for overcoming resistances and immunities to its usual damage type (ha, ka, or ba).

unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
unbreakable.description: Cannot break or jam. Even if misused, like chopping down a tree with a broadsword.

absorbing.name: Absorbing
absorbing.description: Each scene, provides 1 point of protection per hero level. Each point absorbs 1 life damage. Applies thrice.

dazzle.name: Dazzle
dazzle.description: Once per scene, hero can hinder [-] one enemy roll as a free action. Applies multiple times.

flashy.name: Flashy
flashy.description: [+] to leadership or helping an ally once per scene.

foolishglimmer.name: Foolish Glimmer
foolishglimmer.description: [+] to ka damage vs those who can feel greed.

foolsluck.name: Fool's Luck
foolsluck.description: Gain 1 reroll for the rest of the session.

forgettable.name: Forgettable
forgettable.description: [+] to hiding or stealth. [-] to drawing attention.

lighter.name: Lighter
lighter.description: Occupies 1 less inventory. Applies multiple times.

spiked.name: Spiked
spiked.description: Covered in attack surfaces (ha, ka, or ba). Attackers always take damage, whether their attacks hit or not. Damage progression: 1 → 2 → 3, etc. Applies multiple times.

treated.name: Treated
treated.description: [+] vs damage type (d8 or choice): (1) blunt force, (2) bullets and piercing, (3) slashing, (4) energy, (5) necrotic and cold, (6) thermal and fire, (7) strange magical effects and spells, (8) chemical and acid. Applies to different damage each time.

unrusting.name: Unrusting
unrusting.description: Cannot be corroded or damaged by elemental effects. Even dirt finds it hard to stick.

unsplintering.name: Unsplintering
unsplintering.description: When used to negate damage from an attack, the item is knocked flying rather than destroyed.

accelerated.name: Accelerated
accelerated.description: Somehow faster in time. [+] to initiative and speed tests, but critical failure range increased one step. E.g. 1 → 2.

carcinisation.name: Carcinisation
carcinisation.description: The item assumes the general habit or body of a crab.

eternal.name: Eternal
eternal.description: The item is an anchor through time. It always existed, always will. Past and future echo through it. Once per session, the hero can sacrifice one attribute point to regain 1d6 points in another attribute.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.description: So fluffy one might die. [+] to relevant ba tests.

halfthere.name: Half-there
halfthere.description: And half elsewhere. No penalty vs ghosts and such, but half as effective against anything without a soul (ka).

lucky.name: Lucky
lucky.description: If the item is lost, dropped, or misplaced, it never breaks and is always found.

intelligent.name: Intelligent
intelligent.description: A daemon awakens inside. Its Thought score is d6-1. It resents foolish owners.

malleable.name: Malleable
malleable.description: Items surface can be molded and shaped like clay.

neorganic.name: Ne-organic
neorganic.description: It is now a living item. Possibly fleshy.

opalescent.name: Opalescent
opalescent.description: The item is translucent and iridescent. Once per session, the hero can spend 1d4 life to reroll any die.

remembering.name: Remembering
remembering.description: Even if broken, it reassembles and repairs itself over a week. Plants die nearby.

selfrepairing.name: Self-Repairing
selfrepairing.description: Item can spend 1 supply in order to repair itself over 10 minutes.

stochastic.name: Stochastic
stochastic.description: Ordered randomness infuses the item. At the start of each session its player rolls a d20. For the rest of the session, when they roll that natural number, they roll a second d20, adding evens but subtracting odds.

stupid.name: Stupid
stupid.description: The item acquires an anti-intelligence. [-] to tests that require tact and nuance. On a natural 13, hero gains 1 hero die.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.description: To be near, but especially inside a baseline human.

vomish.name: Vomish
vomish.description: Living machines infest the item. [+] to relevant tests, but when not observed it may crawl away to do its own thing.

xenocolours.name: Xenocolours
xenocolours.description: Pretty. Hues refract the lights of alien suns.

youthful.name: Youthful
youthful.description: Its persona is childlike, time does not wear it down.

zu.name: Zu
zu.description: The item crawls with alien energies. Once, the hero can set any rolled die to any number. The item then disappears.
